name: Speedrun Guy
description:
Race through 15 levels as fast as you can in this easy-to-pick-up 2D platformer.

This game is short and sweet, but all about mastering the controls and stages to earn a lower time.

While an initial run should only take around 5 minutes, your best time is automatically saved and presented to you at the end of each playthrough, making this game perfect to replay.

Controls: Move/JumpArrow Keys
Skip to next random song
SInstant respawn (after death)RToggle fullscreenF
Complete reset
Esc

Music Credits:
